EmailTemplate.description: Email template when Client Sat Survey initiation form decline has been rejected
EmailTemplate.name: CS Process Denial Rejection Notification HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Client Sat Survey Initiation form decline has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your request to decline sending {!Client_Sat_Survey__c.Name} was overruled by {!ApprovalRequest.Process_Approver}. The survey will be sent to the assigned contact.
